page.title: 17Didbrook School Playtime
page.content: There's lots of noise, the playing of games and some children shouting across to each other. Infants and Juniors run around screaming and shouting. The older boys want to play cricket. They tell Scott to go away and play in the other playground. The Junior girls are playing Dub-Dub-In. Rachael runs from behind the terrapin, but Helen whirls round and dubs her out. Some girls play horses, some pick daisies and make daisy chains. Other children put the mats out and go on the climbing frame. They all do little wheels together. Samantha and Alice walk around looking very bored. In the middle of the playground the Infants decide to play Line Tag. They run all over the playground. Alex gets annoyed and chases them.Somebody usually falls over and it's Stella today. Mr.Sanders calls,"In time!" and they all go in.
